activities:
Websites operated by Rovia LLC may retain and process the personal information provided for purposes including the marketing, payment of sales commission and performance tracking. 
We may collect personally identifiable information including name, address, email address and phone number. We may record this information manually and/or electronically and act as the data controller for such information.
Rovia may disclose and transfer personal information to other affiliates and associates of the Rovia group of companies which may be situated inside and outside of the EEA and to other persons for the purposes of Rovia’s business.
eucountries: Austria, Cyprus, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Slovenia, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personally identifiable information and aggregate information
recoursemech: Commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union (EU DPAs) or their authorized representatives.
